How Our Honour System Works

At Kehler Vegetable Company, we believe in trust and community, which is why our farmstand runs on the honour system. It's a simple yet meaningful way to connect with our customers while keeping things straightforward and convenient. Each day, we stock our farmstand with the freshest produce, berries, and eggs, harvested right from our fields. Located at the farm gate, our farmstand is open for you to browse at your own pace. Simply select the items you'd like, tally your total, and leave your payment in the designated box. It's that easy! By shopping with us, you're not just supporting local agricultureâ€”you're embracing a system built on mutual trust and shared values. We're proud to offer a shopping experience that fosters simplicity, honesty, and a closer connection to the land.

Your Farm-Fresh Vegetables Today!

Why wait to enjoy the freshest produce? With our pre-order system, you get first access to our most delicious, locally-grown vegetables, berries, and pasture-raised eggs.
